Vishal Addala(vxa162530)
Sai Anuhya Devalla(sxd161030)

The neural network was implemented using python 3.2

For car datasets:
To preprocess the data run preprocessor.py on the dataset
The output file generated after preprocessor.py is given as the input file to the NeuralNetwork.py program

Commands to run:
	python preprocessor.py
	python NeuralNetwork.py

Screenshots have attached to show execution on each dataset


Example run:
Preprocessing:
python preprocessor.py
enter the name of the csv file to preprocess
car.data.txt
enter the name of the csv file
carscaleddataset.txt

Running the NeuralNetwork:
python NeuralNetwork.py
enter name of dataset
filename:
carscaleddataset.txt
enter the training percent80
enter error tolerance2
enter number of epoches100
enter number of hidden layers2
enter neurons in each layer4
enter neurons in each layer6

Output:
train error=0.017
hidden layer 1
